title: Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9008", September 11, 1935
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 6397/1"-1'0-/F.S./WEST/D./ 9/11/35, 9/11/35, 2, SL./1, OFFICE; inscribed in graphite with dimensions, materials, and instructions.
description: Elevation and plans for hardware for suite of bedroom furniture # 9008. Suite includes dresser, chest, desk, two vanity pedestals, and two night tables. Pulls are horizontal mahogany strips with rounded underside, and polished chrome underneath pull.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9008", September 11, 1935.
September 11, 1935. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-918.
